definitions.definition: Denotes a mingling or intermixing with distinct or separable objects. (See Usage Note at amidst .)
examples: How can you speak with authority about their customs when you have never lived among them?

definitions.definition: Denotes a belonging of a person or a thing to a group.
examples: He is among the few who completely understand the subject.

definitions.definition: Denotes a sharing of a common feature in a group.
examples: Lactose intolerance is common among people of Asian heritage.

main_definition: Denotes a mingling or intermixing with distinct or separable objects. (See Usage Note at amidst .)
secondary_definitions: Denotes a belonging of a person or a thing to a group.
Denotes a sharing of a common feature in a group.
